name: Unexplored Dungeon
description:
Unexplored Dungeon is a Platformer that disables one of your buttons on each screen of the randomly generated dungeon and has been developed on PICO-8 for the gmtk game jam 2020.

Controls (explained in-game)⬆: Leap forward
⬅➡: Move horizontally
⬇: Climb/Fall through platforms
Z/C/N: Build/Take Ladder

 You can also play it on the BBS-Thread or by typing

load #unexplored_dungeon-0

into the command line if you own if you own PICO-8.
